entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Peterborough

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 6:27 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
